dc_title_s: Map of the states of North & South Carolina engraved & printed by Fenner Sears & Co.
dc_creator_sm: Hinton, Isaac Taylor, 1799-1847.,Fenner, Sears & Co.,Simpkin, Marshall and Co.
dc_description_s: Relief shown by hachures. Greenwich and Washington prime meridians. Shows roads, towns, and county boundaries. Inset: Plan of Charleston (scale [ca. 1:31,000]). 1 map; 24 x 39 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
